title: MD
biography: Carinha de Anjo is a Brazilian children's telenovela created by Leonor Corrêa and written by Íris Abravanel, originally broadcast by SBT from November 21, 2016 to June 6, 2018. It is a based on the 2000 Mexican telenovela Carita de ángel.
aiSummary: Silvia Franceschi is a cancer epidemiology specialist with an H-index of 168 at CRO Italy (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet Oncology, The Lancet Global Health, The Lancet. Based in Italy.
